snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include a look at a Chinese team linked to hacking attacks at companies in the United States, a claim by China that the...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include a look at a Chinese team linked to hacking attacks at companies in the United States, a claim by China that the United States is trying to hack Chinese military Web sites and a top Google official’s lukewarm assessment of Motorola’s new phones.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Chinese Hackers and Accusers
